item.title: By: Alli
item.dc:creator: Alli
item.description: What a great place to spend lunch! Ever since seeing Masterchef I have wanted to visit and I am hoping on my next trip to Sydney in Feb it will happen...fingers crossed. After seeing all you photos I definitely have to go!
item.content:encoded: What a great place to spend lunch! Ever since seeing Masterchef I have wanted to visit and I am hoping on my next trip to Sydney in Feb it will happen…fingers crossed. After seeing all you photos I definitely have to go!

item.title: By: Betty @ The Hungry Girl
item.dc:creator: Betty @ The Hungry Girl
item.description: Yay! I remember you writing on my Aria post that you hoped to go there one day - you made it! I was too busy taking photos of the food as well, instead of the view ;) Love the presentation of everything, it all looks gorgeous, and so do you!
item.content:encoded: Yay! I remember you writing on my Aria post that you hoped to go there one day – you made it! I was too busy taking photos of the food as well, instead of the view ðŸ˜‰ Love the presentation of everything, it all looks gorgeous, and so do you!

item.title: By: Karen
item.dc:creator: Karen
item.description: The desserts look absolutely gorgeous! (And look like they taste it too...)
item.content:encoded: The desserts look absolutely gorgeous! (And look like they taste it too…)

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: How exciting! I wish someone would take me to Aria for Christmas lunch lol. I remember how well you did the Aria dessert, in fact it looked so much like that first photo! You look absolutely gorgeous in the photos too and you're taller than Matt! :O
item.content:encoded: How exciting! I wish someone would take me to Aria for Christmas lunch lol. I remember how well you did the Aria dessert, in fact it looked so much like that first photo! You look absolutely gorgeous in the photos too and you’re taller than Matt! :O

item.title: By: Jenn AKA The Leftover Queen
item.dc:creator: Jenn AKA The Leftover Queen
item.description: Looks like a lovely lunch indeed! Enjoy the rest of the holidays!
item.content:encoded: Looks like a lovely lunch indeed! Enjoy the rest of the holidays!

item.title: By: Steph
item.dc:creator: Steph
item.description: Wow what a great place to go for a Christmas lunch! And you're so lucky to grab a photo with Matt :) Yeah I'm not sure I would be able to handle that much rich cocoa either!
item.content:encoded: Wow what a great place to go for a Christmas lunch! And you’re so lucky to grab a photo with Matt ðŸ™‚ Yeah I’m not sure I would be able to handle that much rich cocoa either!

item.title: By: sippitysup
item.dc:creator: sippitysup
item.description: What a fabulous meal! You look so happy in all the pictures that I can tell it was delicious. GREG
item.content:encoded: What a fabulous meal! You look so happy in all the pictures that I can tell it was delicious. GREG
